title: 35. What Makes A Product 'Good'? Understanding Ingredients As Skin Experts With Esthetician Michele Phelan
description:
Greetings Treatment Roomies! In this episode we are talking with Michele Phelan, founder of Concepts Institute, to talk about how to better understand what's in your skincare products. Michele has been a licensed and practicing esthetician for 30 years. She owns her own private practice for 20+ years, and is an active educator for Concepts Institute in San Francisco, CA. She's offering all online for the remainder of May 2020!

Find Michele and her courses at www.conceptsinstitute.com

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
